productDetails:
GLAM ICON 3-STRIPES BACKPACK
A BAG FOR WORK AND PLAY, MADE IN PART WITH RECYCLED CONTENT.
New season, a new addition to the roster. Introducing this Adidas backpack, though you already know that from the iconic 3-Stripes. Like all the best packs, this one is sporty and flexible. It can carry your gym kit one day, a change of clothes and a boarding pass the next. Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, eg. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

DETAILS
Dimensions: 15 cm x 32 cm x 47 cm
Volume: 27.5 L
63% recycled polyester, 37% nylon twill
Zip main compartment
Front zip pockets
Side slip-in pockets
Twill

productName: Adidas ADI CHIC Sneaker For Women
productDetails:
STEP UP YOUR RUNS IN THESE URBAN CHIC SHOES
Dual color web design with superior quality mesh. Different designs of upper with qtr webbing and heat transfer branding make shoes different and classy. Sole:- perfect gripping, extra cushioning, lightweight, and durability of shoe. Extremely light weight 3d bottom pulse boosts the side profile which adds extra cushion on the heel. Sneakers made with this bottom would be pretty comfortable.

Mesh upper
Lace-up closure
EVA midsole
Rubber Outsole
